title: Is western civilisation at a crossroads between a new enlightenment and a new dark ages? - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe Europeans have wised up to Enlightenment ideals such as indiscriminate tolerance being used against them, as well as disingenous attempts to conflate race & religion into a single issue to further the relio-political agendas of certain primitive expansionist religions. Europe is not willing to be be dragged back to the Dark Ages despite the best and concerted efforts of religious minorities, backward countries and ideologies.
If this is the case, there’s nothing fresh about it. The previous Enlightenment remains an unfinished project.
